params.name: batch_or_char_index
params.description: Index of the sequence in the batch. If the batch only comprise one sequence, this can be the index ofthe character in the original string.

params.name: char_index
params.description: If a batch index is provided in batch_or_token_index, this can be the index of the character in theoriginal string.

params.name: sequence_index
params.description: If pair of sequences are encoded in the batch this can be used to specify which sequence in the pair (0or 1) the provided character index belongs to.

return.description: Index or indices of the associated encoded token(s).
